T02D3132:274b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang /
T02D3132:274b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang /
T02D3132:274b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang /
T02D3132:274b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa dang /
T02D3132:274b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bee d'ury'a'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang /
T02D3132:274b-33: ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal sh'akya thub pa 'khor
T02D3132:274b-34: dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa spyan drangs nas mtshan
T02D3132:274b-35: nas brjod de / phyag btsal zhing mchod pa dang /
T02D3132:274b-36: mdo dang mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang /
T02D3132:274b-37: che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir /
T02D3132:274b-38: bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman
T02D3132:275a-0: zhing ma dag par gyur pas ma 'tshal @275a *
T02D3132:275a-2: bag ma mchis pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang /
T02D3132:275a-3: yid kyi spyod pa thams cad nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dres pa dang /
T02D3132:275a-4: mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan la gtsang pras ma phyed pa dang /
T02D3132:275a-5: mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs
T02D3132:275a-6: pa la sogs pa 'khrul zhing nongs par gyur pa
T02D3132:275a-7: thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan
T02D3132:275a-8: pa thams cad la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na
T02D3132:275a-9: / thugs brtse bar mdzad de bzod par bzhes shing /
T02D3132:275a-10: 'phral yun gnyis su bdag cag la sgrib pa dang
T02D3132:275a-11: gnod par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol
T02D3132:275a-12: / 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang deng ngam dgung 'di'i
T02D3132:275a-13: bar du bdag cag la sogs pa 'gro ba phongs
T02D3132:275a-14: shing nyam thag pa'i sems can thams cad kyis phan
T02D3132:275a-15: pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad cing bka' stsal pa
T02D3132:275a-16: / yang / da dung yang bdag cag la thugs
T02D3132:275a-17: brtse bas yang dang yang du gdan 'dzam par mdzad
T02D3132:275a-18: / yang / par dgongs shing / so so'i sangs
T02D3132:275a-19: rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa rnams su 'gro
T02D3132:275a-20: ba'i don la gshegs su gsol /
T02D3132:275a-21: mjug 'dir bsngo ba'i tshigs bcad kyang bklag go //
T02D3132:275a-24: // / dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan
T02D3132:275a-25: po lha sras khri srong lde'u btsan gyi sku tshe
T02D3132:275a-26: bsring ba dang / dbu rmog btsan pa dang /
T02D3132:275a-29: tshogs gnyis spel ba'i ched du /
T02D3132:275a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam
T02D3132:275a-31: gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde'i man ngag /
